title.narrative: IFC Inclusive Green Growth Trust Fund

description.narrative:
A strategic Memorandum of Understanding (MOU), which governs the collaboration between Denmark and IFC, was signed in October 2010. It was agreed that the parties would cooperate within the following strategic areas: Sub-Saharan Africa, Fragile States, Environment and Climate and Gender Equality. With reference to the MOU, Denmark agreed in October 2010 to contibute mDKK 25 to fund IFC's advisory services in Zimbabwe, Somalia and South Sudan and activities within gender equality (File:73.c.95.c.4.).
In december 2013, Denmark and IFC signed an agreement in the context of the MOU with the intention to complement collaboration around Inclusive Green Growth. Denmark would contribute mDKK 24,2 IFC's activities wihtin a) b) Clean and Resource Efficient Growth, Resilient Growth and c)Inclusive Growth.
Furthermore, it was decided to contribute DKK 715,845 to Danida's continuing participation to the Donor Committee for Enterprise Development ("DCED")Program.
In 2014, it was decided to contribute additonal 25 mDKK to Inclusive Green Growth.
